ftbquests.chapter.magical.title: Magical[--魔法--]
ftbquests.chapter.magical.quests0.title: Corporea Networks[--多媒体网络--]
ftbquests.chapter.magical.quests0.subtit: Magical Digital Storage[--魔法数字存储--]
ftbquests.chapter.magical.quests0.descri: &bCorporea Sparks&r are the first part of &6Corporea networks&r, which allow you to &6request items from connected inventories&r. Networks can only handle &6active requests&r, nothing is done passively, nor can it ever &oadd&r items to the network.[--&b多媒体火花&r是&6多媒体网络&r的第一个部分,它允许你&6从连接的库存中请求物品&r.网络只能处理&6主动请求&r,没有被动完成,它也永远不会&o向网络添加&r物品.--]

Corporea Sparks automatically &6connect to other nearby Corporea Sparks of the same color&r, which can be changed using dyes. Each network also requires a single &bMaster Corporea Spark&r.[--多媒体火花会自动&6连接到附近的其他相同颜色的多媒体火花&r,这些火花可以通过染料改变.每个网络还需要一个&b主多媒体火花&r.--]

Corporea Sparks can &6access items in the inventory directly below them&r. This does &cnot&r apply to the Master Corporea Spark, which has to be placed on an inventory but cannot access it... for some reason.[--多媒体火花可以&6直接访问下方库存中的物品&r.这&c不&r适用于主多媒体火花,该火花必须放在容器上,但因某些原因无法访问.--]
ftbquests.chapter.magical.quests1.descri: When near the &bCorporea Index&r, you can &6say in chat&r an item and the amount to request it from inventories connected to the Corporea Spark on top of it.[--当你靠近&b多媒体索引&r时,你可以&6在聊天栏中说一个物品和数量来请求从它上面连接到多媒体火花的库存中请求它.--]
You can ask for \"&632 Stone&r\" or \"&6half a stack of stone&r\" and both will work.[--你可以请求“&632石头&r”或“&6半组石头&r”,两个都行。--]
Since the Index technically doesn't have an inventory, you can place the Master Corporea Spark on it without losing any functionality.[--由于索引在技术上没有库存,你可以在不丢失任何功能的情况下在上面放置主多媒体火花.--]
ftbquests.chapter.magical.quests2.descri: When given a &6redstone signal&r, the &bCorporea Funnel&r will request an item from its Corporea network&r and insert it into the inventory 1 or 2 blocks below itself, or drop it on the ground.[--当给它一个&6红石信号&r时,&b多媒体漏斗&r会从多媒体网络中请求一个物品&r并将其插入其下方1个或2个方块的库存中,或者将其扔在地上.--]

Place a &6filled Item Frame&r on it to set which item is requested. Rotate it once to pull 2, again for 4, then 8, 16, 32, and 64. If it has multiple Item Frames, it will choose a random one to request.[--在它上放一个&6填充物品框架&r来设置请求的物品。旋转它一次来拉2,再拉4,然后8,16,32和64。如果它有多个物品框架,它将随机选择一个请求.--]
ftbquests.chapter.magical.quests3.descri: The &bCorporea Interceptor&r will emit a redstone pulse when the item in an Item Frame placed on it is requested, but none are available.[--&b多媒体拦截器&r在请求放置在它上方的物品框架中时会发出红石脉冲,但是没有。--]

This can be used in tandem with the &6Corporea Funnel&r to craft items that you are out of. For example, place a 1x1 &6Crafty Crate&r, place a &6Hopper&r aimed at it, place a &6Corporea Funnel&r with a Spark and an Item Frame (with Stone placed in it), and then place a &6Corporea Interceptor&r with a Spark and an Item Frame with a Button on top of &othat&r.[--这可以与&6多媒体漏斗&r并行使用,用于制作你所没有的物品。例如,放置1x1&6Crafty Crate&r,放置一个&6漏斗&r,放置一个&6多媒体漏斗&r,放置一个火花和物品框架(其中放有石子),然后放置一个&6多媒体拦截器&r,并放置一个火花和物品框架,在&oathat&r上方有一个按钮.--]

When a Button is requested but none are available, the Interceptor will emit a Redstone Pulse, this activates the Funnel, which will send the Stone to the Crafty Crate, &6which will craft the Button and drop it out the bottom&r.[--当需要按钮但无可用,拦截器会发出红石脉冲,这将激活漏斗,它会将石头发送到合成板条箱,&6它会制作按钮并将其扔出底部&r.--]

An &6unfortunate limitation&r of this is that you can only request one at a time. You can rotate the Funnel's Item Frame to increase this, but it will still always craft that amount.[--这是&6不幸限制&r,每次只能请求一个。你可以旋转漏斗的物品框架来增加这个数量,但它仍然总是会制作这个数量.--]
ftbquests.chapter.magical.quests4.descri: The &bCorporea Retainer&r is placed next to a Corporea Interceptor and will remember if the Interceptor... intercepts. If it gets a signal after this, it will forget and the thing that requested the Interceptor's item will request it again.[--&b多媒体拦截器&r被放置在多媒体拦截器旁,并将记住拦截器是否拦截。之后如果它得到信号,它将忘记,请求拦截器的物品将再次请求它.--]

For a use-case example, &6place the Retainer next to the Interceptor from the previous quest&r. Place a Corporea Crystal Cube monitoring Buttons nearby, and point a Comparator from it to the Retainer.[--以&6在前次任务&r中将&6存储器放在拦截器旁。在附近放置一个多媒体水晶方块监控按钮,并将一个比较器从它指向存储器.--]

Now, when a Button is requested while none are available, the Interceptor will emit a signal which yada yada, eventually crafting a Button, putting it somewhere in the network, which will let the Crystal Cube know, which will tell the Retainer, &6which will send the newly crafted Button back to the thing that requested it&r.[--现在,当一个按钮被请求,而没有可用的按钮时,拦截器将发出一个信号,最终合成一个按钮,将其放置在网络中某处,这将让水晶立方知道,它会告诉存储器,&6它会将新制作的按钮发送回请求它的东西&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.magical.quests5.descri: The &bCorporea Crystal Cube&r can be right-clicked with an item, and it will &6display the amount of that item is in the network&r.[--&b多媒体水晶立方&r可以用物品右键单击,它会&6显示该物品在网络中的数量&r.--]
Comparators will also emit a signal based on the amount of that item available.[--比较器也会根据可获取的物品数量发出信号。--]
ftbquests.chapter.magical.quests6.subtit: Make an Enchantment Library[--制作一个附魔图书馆--]
ftbquests.chapter.magical.quests6.descri: The &bEnchantment Library&r can &6store Enchanted Books&r, and retrieve the enchantments individually.[--&b附魔图书馆&r可以&6储存附魔书&r,并逐个取出附魔.--]
